name: The Blobfish
description:
You know blobfish (a kind of abyssal fish) - these dudes cannot survive without pressure! Pet a blobfish, make sure it get enough pressure. 

4 ways to put pressure on your blobfish (click around the room to unlock): 

- let it help you programming 

- let it write essay for you 

- let it play with kitty 

- let it have a blind date with lady blobfish

The game currently has some bugs, sorry for that.
